title: Flowmaster's Outlaw Series Cat-back System - 09-16 Toyota Tundra

asset.title: Flowmaster's Outlaw Series Cat-back System - 09-16 Toyota Tundra - 817692
asset.description:
Questions? Give us a call (707) 544-4761

Visit Flowmaster's website: http://bit.ly/1fyGZRh

Flowmaster Part #817692

Application:
Fits 2009-2016 Toyota Tundra with 4.6L or 5.7L V8 engine. 145" Wheelbase Models Only.

Features:
Flowmasters Outlaw Cat-back exhaust system for the 2009-2016 Toyota Tundra truck is perfect for the person looking for maximum sound levels both inside and outside of the truck, with all of the performance benefits that you would expect from Flowmaster. This bolt-on DOR/DOS (Dual Out Rear or Dual Out Side) emissions-legal system for trucks with the 4.6L and 5.7L gas engine features a stainless steel Super 10 muffler and dual mandrel bent 3.00 in. stainless steel tailpipes. The system also features polished 4.00 in. double wall stainless steel tips. The exhaust system is manufactured in the USA and is covered by Flowmaster's Lifetime Limited Warranty. Designed for an easy fit, this system includes all necessary parts and hardware for installation. Note: Does not fit regular cab/short bed or double cab/long bed models.
✓ Stainless Steel Construction
✓ Super Aggressive Sound
✓ Black Ceramic Coated Tips
✓ Lifetime Limited Warranty
✓ Made in the USA
